thread.title: John Chen discusses security and the future of BlackBerry on CBS This Morning
thread.title_full: John Chen discusses security and the future of BlackBerry on CBS This Morning

author: Bla1ze
title: John Chen discusses security and the future of BlackBerry on CBS This Morning
text:
Stopping by CBS This Morning, BlackBerry CEO John Chen sat down to discuss what exactly is going on with BlackBerry, their move to software and security and what the future holds for BlackBerry in the long run.
